title: Vertical translations
text: For the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$, a vertical translation downwards by d units is represented by g(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$ - d.

title: Reflection across the x-axis
text: For the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$, a reflection across the x-axis is represented by g(x) $$=$$ $$-\left(b^x\right)$$.

title: Horizontal translations
text: For the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$, a horizontal translation c units to the left is represented by g(x) $$=$$ $$b^{x+c}$$.
